category: Jury Committee Regulations/Article 2 (Purpose of Establishment of Jury Committee)
contents: Article 2 (Purpose of establishing the referee committee) The referee committee conducts the game by advising on matters related to the independence and autonomy of the referee and duties as a referee so that the referee can carry out his duties fairly according to the game rules with the basic spirit and responsibility of the sport. The purpose is to increase fairness. Revised 2019. 1. 31. [Title revised 2021. 12. 27.] [Full revision 2021. 12. 27.]
